title: Application Support/Prepaid App Support

ambitionBoxData.Title: Financial Software & Systems Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
Application Support/Prepaid App Support: ( 1 to 3 years of relevant experience)

Grade: M1

Location: Navi Mumbai (Belapur)

Roles and Responsibilities:

  • Middleware, WebLogic, Oracle SQL/PLSQL Queries. 
  • Linux commands knowledge along with basic scripting knowledge
  • Basic java knowledge (Analysis and troubleshooting)
  • Prior knowledge of Banking IT Products and Services. Preferably in Payments domain.
  • Able to extend work hours when necessary while managing critical issues. 
  • Coordinate for resolutions with development team and project managers for escalated issues.
  • Troubleshooting and resolve application issues which are escalated by other interfaces.
  • Analysis the logs and provide the actual exceptions (issues) to Development team

Skills:

1.Need to have sound knowledge and hands-on experience on WebLogic

2.Need to have sound knowledge and hands-on experience on SQL / PL SQL

3.Need to have sound knowledge and hands-on experience on Linux

4.Need to have sound knowledge and hands-on experience on JAVA debugging skills

5.Need to have knowledge on OHS, Load balancer and Network.

6.Need to have knowledge and experience in payment domain like card payment, CBS.


Desired Candidate Profile:

  • Exp: 1 to 3 yrs
  • Notice Period: Immediate to 30 days (Mandatory)
  • Job Location: Navi Mumbai (Belapur)
  • Male candidates only
  • Flexible with shifts
  • Work from Office
  • 6 Days Work

title: APPLICATION DEVELOPER
jobDescription:
KIFWAT INDIA is looking for APPLICATION DEVELOPER to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey
  • Design, develop, and maintain software applications to meet business needs and requirementsTroubleshoot and resolve technical issues as they arise, and provide creative solutions to complex problems

title: Flutter App Developer
jobDescription:
We are looking for a Flutter App developer interested in building mobile apps on both the iOS and Android platforms. You will be responsible for architecture and building these applications, as well as coordinating with the teams responsible for other layers of the product infrastructure. Building a product is a highly collaborative effort, and as such, a strong team player with a commitment to perfection is required.

Qualifications MCA, MSC IT/ICT, BE, B.tech or equivalent

Required Skills

  • Flutter: To build cross platform mobile apps for Android, IOS and Web. This should include from making responsive UIs to efficiently query data and also mange states in an optimized mannner.
  • Native Android and IOS: To build custom Flutter Packages.
  • Firebase: Should have experience with Cloud Firestore, Push Notifications, Cloud Functions and Analytics.
  • Adobe XD: Should know how to use Adobe XD to use the design file and use it to build the app.
  • Git: To manage and collaborate in different projects with the rest of the team.
Responsibilities
  • Design and Build sophisticated and highly scalable apps using Flutter.
  • Translate and Build the designs and Wireframes into hight quality reaponsive UI code.
  • Write efficient queries for core Data.
  • Use of ModelViewController ( MVC) and Model-View-ViewModel-Controller (MVVM) as it relates to designing, developing architecture and developing maintainable, testable and functional software that meets product requirements.
  • Explore feasible architectures for implementing new features.
  • Suggest space and time efficient Data Structures.
  • Follow the best practices while developing the app and also keeping everything structured and well documented.
  • Manage the code and project on Git in order to keep in sync with other team members and managers.
  • Ensure security guidelines are always followed while developing the app.
  • Validate the cloud system to ensure any new changes do not compromise security of the backend server.
  • Execute app verification protocol.
  • Following company policies and quality procedures to ensure quality product deliverables.
